title: Fireworks!
description: Hell's Bells, Texas... 2,506 nice folks and a few old grouches.When Meg Taggart first saw that corny sign, she'd been a bride, enchanted by her cowboy husband, Jesse, and her new life.Now, after a five-year estrangement, Meg and Jesse were back - blackmailed into spending time together by their respective grandfathers. Or so the two old men fondly believed.But what had really forced this stormy reunion was the fear that their broken marriage was hurting their young son - and them. Or as Jesse said, "Do you think I'd put myself through this for anything short of love?"
author: Ruth Jean Dale
